trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle keyboard-related routed events.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà gli eventi indirizzati correlati alla tastiera.

trans-unit.source: No existing keyboard event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the KeyboardEventHandler delegate.
trans-unit.target: Nessun evento della tastiera esistente in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] utilizza il delegato KeyboardEventHandler.

trans-unit.source: KeyboardEventHandler uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> base class as its event data class.
trans-unit.target: KeyboardEventHandler utilizza la <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>classe di base come la classe di dati evento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> serves as the base class for the more specific <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> event data classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>funge da classe base per più specifica <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>classi di dati di evento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs></xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: These event data classes are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> delegates, and those delegates are used by existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Queste classi di dati di evento vengono utilizzate per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>delegati e i delegati vengono utilizzati da esistente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] eventi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> e</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>
